text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙa ahdho va qarordodho ki mijoni ʙandagon va Parvardigor va Pajomʙar va çami'i mū'minonand ʙasted, vafo kuned. Halol gardonid hajvonoti cahorpo (şutur, gov, gūsfand va ohu...) ro. Ƣajri onhoe ki, az in pas ʙarojaton gufta meşavad va on ciro, ki dar holi ihrom sajd mekuned, halol maşumored. Ba durustī Alloh on ci mexohad, hukm mekunad
